title: Blank Cordova Starter App
tooltip: Use this sample as a starter app to develop cross-platform mobile apps that can be built to run on various mobile devices. This template has all the device initialization code necessary for creating a mobile app using Cordova or Intel XDK APIs.
description: Use this sample as a starter app to develop cross-platform mobile apps that can be built to run on various mobile devices. This template has all the device initialization code necessary for creating a mobile app using Cordova or Intel XDK APIs.
